comments: I think the FAA doesn't give all the questions to prepware or something because there were questions that weren't on the preware material, there were also altered questions on the test but the app is easy to operate and gives you explanations for the problems.

NEED TO UPDATE! I had the FAA writens exam this week so i studied this app. Before studying i updated the app. I reviewed ALL QUESTIONS and when the testing happend, there were several questions not covered on this app that the FAA changed. I passed but it threw me off. Good app otherwise. Should be able to just hit "next" or "previous" on the test review instead of going back and forth to the questions
Very user friendly.

Good start for preparation, app appears to be out dated, when i took the exam i have notice some questions that was not covered in the prep ware. It helps a bunch but to be safe, extend your research beyond the app aswell.
Very good tool to study

title: Sago Mini Super Juice
description:
Attention, junior trendsetters! Super Juice Café is now open for business. 

Get in line for the wackiest juice bar this side of the Milky Way. Head into outer space, mix up a magical concoction for your Sago Mini friends, then watch as the characters transform in thousands of hilarious ways. It’s our most inventive game yet! 

CREATE YOUR OWN JUICE CONCOCTION

It’s time to mix up the most delicious juice in the universe – and only you know the secret recipe! Use the Mixbots to stir, shake, carbonate and change the colours of your tasty treat. 

THOUSANDS OF HILARIOUS, WACKY REACTIONS

That’s right – thousands! Each unique juice concoction causes the characters to change and react in a different way. You’ll giggle and gasp as you watch Jack grow tall or Jinja turn into a mouse – the possibilities are endless. 

DOUBLE THE FUN 

Perfect for little chefs and comedians alike! Spend time perfecting your juice just as you like it, then serve it to your patient customers for non-stop hilarity. 

All of our apps are free of third-party advertising and in-app purchases for kids. In each app there is a small icon with news about our new apps, special offers, fun videos and more.

• Customize your juice with six different Mixbots
• Thousands of unique character reactions
• Builds creativity, spatial awareness and responsible risk-taking
• Full of fun animations and silly surprises
• Perfect for preschoolers, age 2-5
• Play without WiFi or internet – great for travel
• No in-app purchases or third-party advertising

Sago Mini is an award-winning company devoted to play. We make apps and toys for preschoolers worldwide. Toys that seed imagination and grow wonder. We bring thoughtful design to life. For kids. For parents. For giggles. 

We love making new friends! 
Instagram: @sagomini
Facebook: Sago Mini
Twitter @sagomini
Say hello@sagomini.com

title: Gus Learns Spanish for Kids
description:
Gus on the Go: Learning Spanish has never been so much fun! Join Gus, the friendly owl, as he travels around the world and explore languages from every corner of the globe with Gus on the Go! Featuring adorable animations and fun exercises, your child can learn basic vocabulary concepts with interactive visual and auditory lessons on numbers, colors, shapes and more. Each lesson review unlocks an exciting vocabulary game that reinforces what your child has learned. Now, your child can take on a second language through a fun, multi-sensory journey on any tablet or smartphone.


- Features -


NEW WORDS WITH INTERACTIVE LESSONS 
- Nearly 90 Spanish words to learn
- 10 fun and educational activities
- Native Spanish language audio speaker


HAVE FUN WHILE LEARNING
- Engaging vocabulary reviews after each lesson
- Fun animations and delightful animal noises and transportation sounds
- Easy to navigate country and city maps


EARN ACHIEVEMENTS
- Exciting games, unlocked by completing lesson reviews
- Trophy room to track achievements


USEFUL SPANISH VOCABULARY CATEGORIES
- Animals
- Food
- Clothes

and more . . .


PERMISSIONS

INTERNET permission is used for crash reporting to improve quality of app. No personal or identifying information is sent.


NOTICE TO PARENTS

This app is kid friendly and does NOT contain ads, in-app purchases, links, tracking or sharing functions.

comments: My son finished this game way too quickly. For this price, there should be way more cities to unlock. Not happy.
Cute app that provides a great learning experience while being fun for kids. I found myself using it to relearn spanish 101 basic vocab. Looking forward to meeting Gus in a few other countries!
My daughter is 5 and loved this. I love all the games. But she finished the whole thing in one sitting. I thought it would unlock another map but there is no more than those 4 places on the map.

I found Gus on the Go to be very intuitive, clear and fun for kids and even adults. This is an excellent way to pick up/brush up on basic vocabulary words and to learn the correct pronunciation. I highly recommend and I'm looking forward to seeing more languages (especially Japanese!).

It was a nice app but it barely provided any lessons. Not worth paying 
money for.

title: Toca Mini
description:
Cute, weird or funny? That's up to you in the colorful world of Toca Mini. Let your imagination run wild in this creative app for kids! 

Make scary monsters, fantasy animals or your best friends! Dress up, dress down, three eyes or funny feet? The Minis can become whatever you want! 

To get started, tap your Mini to add colors, stripes, sleeves or even pants. Be creative with stamps to add details such as hats, socks, laces and buttons. Adding facial features allows your Mini to smile, sneeze and see! 

With thousands of possible combinations there are endless ways of creating your very own Mini! Don’t forget to take a snapshot of your creation and share with your friends. 

FEATURES 
• Add amazing animated eyes, mouths, noses and eyebrows 
• Choose from 60 colors and 78 reversible stamps 
• Use stamps to create patterns, hair and clothes 
• Take a snapshot and share your Minis! 
• Lots of colorful backgrounds to choose from! 
• Your Mini makes fun gestures and sounds as you're creating 
• No rules or stress - create and play anyway you want! 
• Kid-friendly interface 
• No third-party advertising 
• No in-app purchases 

***

ABOUT TOCA BOCA
At Toca Boca, we believe in the power of play to spark kids’ imaginations and help them learn about the world. We design our products from the kids' perspective to empower kids to be playful, to be creative and to be who they want to be. Our products include award-winning apps that have been downloaded more than 130 million times in 215 countries and offer fun, safe, open-ended play experiences. Learn more about Toca Boca and our products at tocaboca.com.

PRIVACY POLICY
Privacy is an issue that we take very seriously. To learn more about how we work with these matters, please read our privacy policy: http://tocaboca.com/privacy

title: Prepware Airframe
description:
Comprehensive preparation, study and test tool for the Airframe FAA Knowledge Exam, one step in the Aviation Maintenance Technician (AMT) certification process. More than 1,000 sample questions, answers and explanations included, for you to study by subject or with a true-to-form practice test. Compatible with Android phones and tablets, this app provides a mobile solution for AMTs preparing for their FAA “written” exam. Study by subject, supported with explanations. Take practice tests, and review the graded test.
App features:
• No internet connection required; app fully installs to your device.
• More than 1,000 questions included with explanations.
• Brought to you by a trusted resource in aviation training and publishing, Aviation Supplies & Academics (ASA).

recentChanges: The questions, answers, and explanations have been updated to reflect the most current information available to prepare for your FAA Knowledge Exam.
comments: About 90 percent of the airframe written test questions are covered in this app. Definately would recommend to aspiring A/P mechanics.

Great app but it isn't 100% up to date. When I took my airframe test I noticed between 10-20 questions that were on the test that weren't available to study in this app. that said, if you can consistently get between 80-90% on the in app test you'll be able to make educated guesses on the real test and will pass. I also agree that separating problem questions into a separate testing section would be very useful.

I really enjoy these and they are a good help. But I wont give it 5 starts until it gets an update so I could choose multiple subjects to take at once or test all the questions at once like you can with apple or on a laptop.

great app, must have for testing a&p. The only thing to improve, would be the ability to mark questions in study mode and then added to a separate pool to work on. Mainly for the purpose of getting those problem questions down asap.

The questions and content of the app are spot on with Test Study Guides and other practice literature. However, my app stopped highlight right(green) and wrong(red) answers. In some cases it is difficult to know if your answers are correct based off of the application's explanation.

title: Monkey Math School Sunshine
description:
Join your child's favorite monkey in math games and activities in a playfully designed beach-themed world. 

Monkey Math School Sunshine allows your child to build fundamental math skills while they are endlessly entertained. Your child will count, add and sort their way through engaging games with uninterrupted play.

For ages 3 to 6. 

*** FEATURES! ***
*9 interactive games that teach kids about sequencing, patterning, counting, adding and subtracting. 

*With very little interface, your child presses one button to immediately launch into uninterrupted play. 

*Uses Knack™ Technology to instinctively adjust the challenge levels to each individual player. 

*Irresistibly cute monkey guides the child through game play with animated celebrations for correct answers and gentle redirection for incorrect ones. 

*Kids collect rewards in their ANIMATED AQUARIUM. 

*Uninterrupted and unlimited play: game continues as long as the player desires. 

*** GAMES ***

ADD IT UP and TAKE IT AWAY
Use your addition and subtraction skills to solve math problems. Trusty animated crab assistants supply multiple-choice options. 

PATTERNS 
Monkey has a problem: Objects keep popping out if his bucket, creating a pattern - but one piece is missing! Help the monkey by completing the pattern with the choices provided. 

SHAPES 
Is it an octagon? Or maybe a hexagon? Count each side of these shapes to help Monkey figure it out. 

SEQUENCES 
Monkey has a group of numbers in the right order, but some are missing. Help him complete the sequence with the correct numbers. 

LESS/MORE 
Monkey loves to blow bubbles, but when he does, groups of shells, fish or turtles are inside each bubble! Use your expertise to figure out which bubble has either the most or least objects inside. 

BIGGER/SMALLER 
Which bubble has the bigger number? Which bubble has the smaller one? Help Monkey figure it out by popping the correct bubble. 

CONNECT THE DOTS 
Baby Turtle is stuck on the beach and she needs your help to get to the sea! Connect the dots to show her which way to go. 

WRITE IT UP! 
Help Monkey identify numbers by tracing them in the sand. 

BUBBLE POP 
Monkey is running out of time! Pop all the bubbles that have either the right number or the right amount of objects inside before the time runs out!

comments: I love it! And I love it when the narrator says numbers more than 10!

I love this app and my 4 year old grandson really enjoys playing with it. It covers a useful range of activities and moves at a good speed. The reward system is good - he likes collecting fish and plants for his aquarium.
This is hands down the best math learning app for preschool. My kids have all used it for years. Not boring, just right level and engagement. Thanks Thup.
My special need child loves it!!! Easy to navigate and my child is learning....GREAT APP!
Awesome learning for my young ones..👍👍I love it!

title: Flat Earth Sun, Moon & Zodiac Clock
description:
The  Flat Earth Sun, Moon & Zodiac   Clock  shows  you  where  you  are  and  where  the  sun  and  moon  are  on  their  journey  around  the  face  of  the  earth  as  shown  on  the  Azimuthal  Equidistant  projection  map.  You  can  see  where  the  daylight  and  night  time  are  as  well  as  the  position  and  phase  of  the  moon  as  the  sun  slowly  laps  it  every  month.Track  the  seasons  as  the  sun  travels  outward  to  the  Tropic  of  Capricorn  in  December  and  then  makes  its  way  inward  to  the  Tropic  of  Cancer  for  June.    


Time-Lapse  function:  Hourly  and  daily  time-lapse  speeds.    Watch  the  phases  and  location  of  the  moon  along  with  sun’s  position  as  it  travels  between  the  tropics.    Watch  how  the  day  and  night  change  during  the  seasons  and  how  they  become  equal  during  the  two  equinoxes. 

Customizable  backgrounds:  Images  of  Antarctica,  high  altitude  balloon  shots,  vast  ocean  scenery  and  many  others.    Just  hit  the  settings  icon  in  the  bottom  right  corner  and  select  any  background  you  like.    Switch  to  different  backgrounds  anytime.

Standard  features  include:    

Analog  sun  &  moon  clock  with  day  and  night:    Shows  the  sun  and  moon  positions  along  with  moon  phases  and  day  and  night.Watch  as  the  sun  makes  its  daily  journey  around  the  face  of  the  earth. 

Digital  time  and  date:  In  the  upper  left  the  time  and  date  will  be  shown  in  digital  format.

Local  weather:    Your  local  high  and  low  temperature  along  with  sunrise  and  sunset  times.
descriptionHTML:
The Flat Earth Sun, Moon & Zodiac Clock shows you where you are and where the sun and moon are on their journey around the face of the earth as shown on the Azimuthal Equidistant projection map. You can see where the daylight and night time are as well as the position and phase of the moon as the sun slowly laps it every month.Track the seasons as the sun travels outward to the Tropic of Capricorn in December and then makes its way inward to the Tropic of Cancer for June.


Time-Lapse function: Hourly and daily time-lapse speeds. Watch the phases and location of the moon along with sun’s position as it travels between the tropics. Watch how the day and night change during the seasons and how they become equal during the two equinoxes.

Customizable backgrounds: Images of Antarctica, high altitude balloon shots, vast ocean scenery and many others. Just hit the settings icon in the bottom right corner and select any background you like. Switch to different backgrounds anytime.

Standard features include:

Analog sun & moon clock with day and night: Shows the sun and moon positions along with moon phases and day and night.Watch as the sun makes its daily journey around the face of the earth.

Digital time and date: In the upper left the time and date will be shown in digital format.

Local weather: Your local high and low temperature along with sunrise and sunset times.
summary: Flat Earth Sun, Moon & Zodiac  is a way to track sun&moon around the circle of
comments: Dave, you took a good thing and turned it into something annoying. Do yourself a favor and get rid of the strong arm tactics and put in a button so that those who want the extra features, can pay for the extra features, like every other app on the market. Personally, I'm tired of seeing you beg for more money every time I open your app, an app I already paid for. Now, you may care less if I unsubscribe, but when thousands refuse to pay the monthly fee, what have you gained? Already tried that,

Can Not Use! Dave, I love you to pieces, but I could never use the actual clock itself. The app would always freeze. Then I got a prompt to update the other day.... And now I cannot open the app whatsoever. It always sends me an error report. Help! Happy to update to five stars if this ever works out right.

Was a nice app before the hammer came down and it's now required for us to check a box that no one will know what we gave away by permissions in addition to making it real difficult to deny subscription. Real bait and switch method and my life was good before this app and will be good sticking this app on the other side of the flat earth.

I've just bought the app and it's got my location and the correct time and date but the sun is nowhere near where it should be. It's 7.16pm here in New Zealand and the sun is just west of South America. Also can the app be set to be your PC desktop whenever you turn on your laptop? I try to get the app on the 24 hour mode but it keeps reverting to 12 hours. Any advice would help. Thank you because I appreciate what you are trying to do.

After Facebook disabled my account for sharing Flat Earth ideology posts, it was because of this app and the daily videos, I was able to find true Flat Earth channels on YouTube do to their algorithms in their search engine making it virtually impossible to find a channel that doesn't debunk or at least try's to debunk the whole ideology in itself. I was able to subscribe to the channel and from there, find other channels that they subscribed to theirselves. This app was well worth the money! 🤫

title: What's in Space?
description:
Enjoy discovering space with games and amusing animations. Explore the Solar System, the planets, the constellations, the asteroids, the international space station, rockets, etc.

Become a true astronaut, build your own spaceship, explore the constellations, travel through space!

"What’s in Space?” It is the perfect app for curious children. With easy and simple narrated texts, educational games, and incredible illustrations, children will learn basic information about space: what planets are in the solar system, what each planet is like, the constellations that can be seen in the sky, the astronauts, the spaceships...

This app also has lots of educational games to play without any rules, stress, or time limits. Suitable for all ages!

FEATURES 

• To learn basic information about space.
• With dozens of educational games: build a space rocket, dress an astronaut, learn the names of the planets, follow the stars of the constellations, etc.
• Completely narrated. Perfect for non-readers and children who are starting to read.
• Content suitable for children aged 4 and over. Games for the whole family. Hours of fun. 
• No Ads.
• No in-app purchases, or tricks of any kind.


WHY "WHAT’S IN SPACE?"?

"What’s in Space?” is an easy-to-use educational game that excites kids with educational games and beautiful illustrations about space, planets, and astronauts. Download it now to:

• Discover the Solar System and its planets.
• Learn about astronauts: How do they live and what do they do?
• Explore satellites, rockets, and the space station. 
• Observe the sky, the stars, and their constellations.
• Play fun and educational games.
• Enjoy an educational entertainment.

Kids love to play and learn about space through games. "What’s in Space?” contains explanations, illustrations, real images, and games about the planets, the asteroids, the stars and much more.

ABOUT LEARNY LAND

At Learny Land, we love to play, and we believe that games must form part of the educational and growth stage of all children; because to play is to discover, explore, learn and have fun. Our educational games help children learn about the world around them and are designed with love. They are easy to use, beautiful and safe. Because boys and girls have always played to have fun and learn, the games we make - like the toys that last a lifetime - can be seen, played and heard.

At Learny Land we take advantage of the most innovative technologies and the most modern devices to take the experience of learning and playing a step further. We create toys that could not have existed when we were young.
Read more about us at www.learnyland.com.

Privacy Policy

We take Privacy very seriously. We do not collect or share personal information about your children or allow any type of third party ads. To learn more, please read our privacy policy at www.learnyland.com.

Contact us

We'd love to know your opinion and your suggestions. Please, write to info@learnyland.com.

With easy and simple narrated texts, educational games, and incredible illustrations, children will learn basic information about space: what planets are in the solar system, what each planet is like, the constellations that can be seen in the sky, the astronauts, the spaceships...

This app also has lots of educational games to play without any rules, stress, or time limits. Suitable for all ages!

FEATURES

• To learn basic information about space.
• With dozens of educational games: build a space rocket, dress an astronaut, learn the names of the planets, follow the stars of the constellations, etc.
• Completely narrated. Perfect for non-readers and children who are starting to read.
• Content suitable for children aged 4 and over. Games for the whole family. Hours of fun.
• No Ads.
• No in-app purchases, or tricks of any kind.


WHY "WHAT’S IN SPACE?"?

"What’s in Space?” is an easy-to-use educational game that excites kids with educational games and beautiful illustrations about space, planets, and astronauts. Download it now to:

• Discover the Solar System and its planets.
• Learn about astronauts: How do they live and what do they do?
• Explore satellites, rockets, and the space station.
• Observe the sky, the stars, and their constellations.
• Play fun and educational games.
• Enjoy an educational entertainment.

Kids love to play and learn about space through games. "What’s in Space?” contains explanations, illustrations, real images, and games about the planets, the asteroids, the stars and much more.

ABOUT LEARNY LAND

At Learny Land, we love to play, and we believe that games must form part of the educational and growth stage of all children; because to play is to discover, explore, learn and have fun. Our educational games help children learn about the world around them and are designed with love. They are easy to use, beautiful and safe. Because boys and girls have always played to have fun and learn, the games we make - like the toys that last a lifetime - can be seen, played and heard.

At Learny Land we take advantage of the most innovative technologies and the most modern devices to take the experience of learning and playing a step further. We create toys that could not have existed when we were young.
Read more about us at www.learnyland.com.

Privacy Policy

We take Privacy very seriously. We do not collect or share personal information about your children or allow any type of third party ads. To learn more, please read our privacy policy at www.learnyland.com.

Contact us

We'd love to know your opinion and your suggestions. Please, write to info@learnyland.com.
summary: Planets and stars for kids
recentChanges: Back button improvements
comments: Great app for the littles to use when learning about space. My four year old enjoyed it.
Great work

title: Sago Mini Road Trip
description:
Go for a fun-filled drive with Jinja the cat. Pick a destination, select a vehicle and hit the road. What will Jinja drive today? Choose a sporty racing car, a jumpy jeep or a funny pickle car! Stop along the way to wash and fuel up. When the drive is done, a happy welcome is waiting for you!	

Playful and friendly, Sago Mini Road Trip puts kids in the driver’s seat. With super easy controls, young kids will love zipping along the road. Part of the award-winning suite of Sago Mini apps, this app will make you laugh out loud.	

All of our apps are free of third-party advertising and in-app purchases for kids. In each app there is a small icon with news about our new apps, special offers, fun videos and more.

Features	
• More than ten vehicles, from racing cars to a shoe-mobile	
• Six destinations from magical mountains to the big city	
• No rules or time pressures. Explore at your own pace	
• Perfect to bring along on your own road trips	
• Great for toddlers and preschoolers, ages 2-5	
• No in-app purchases or third-party advertising, so you and your child are free to discover without interruptions! 

Sago Mini is an award-winning company devoted to play. We make apps and toys for preschoolers worldwide. Toys that seed imagination and grow wonder. We bring thoughtful design to life. For kids. For parents. For giggles.

title: Phonograms
description:
Welcome to The Spalding Method™  Phonograms app!

NOTICE: UPON INSTALLING THIS MOBILE APPLICATION, YOU ARE AGREEING TO THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS.

This Spalding Phonograms app is designed for helping students learn the phonics connection between speech sounds and written symbols that represent those sounds (phonograms). Learning the phonograms is essential for accurate and automatic reading, writing, and spelling. Teaching all the sounds of the phonemes represented by an alphabet letter or combination of two, three, or four letters (phonograms) enables students to read, spell, and write high-frequency words quickly. Students who learn the phonograms well expand their vocabulary and are able to use effective and creative communication skills in writing. Critical thinking is involved in learning the appropriate phonogram placement within words for accurate spelling and for applying information learned during phonogram reviews to pronounce unfamiliar words. 

The Spalding Phonograms app is for students that need additional practice, including home schooling, ESL (English as a Second Language), ELL (English Language Learners), ESOL (English for Speakers of Other Languages) students, and those with dyslexia or other learning disabilities. The school and home connection is encouraged through collaboration and communication with the teacher, parent, and student for practicing the phonograms appropriately and adequately. The Spalding  Phonograms app aligns with the core reading foundational skills required by state and national standards that are most crucial to the development of early reading success and reading comprehension, including:

  •	Phonemic awareness
  •	Feature recognition
  •	Letter recognition
  •	Sound-symbol relationships (decoding)

The Spalding Phonograms app provides the following options for all 87 phonograms.

  •	Phonogram Introduction by selected group – The student sees the phonograms in order of instruction in "The Writing Road to Reading," listens to the teacher say the sound(s), and then says the sound(s).
  •	Oral Phonogram Review – A random phonogram card is show, followed by a pause. The student says the sound(s) and then listens to check accuracy. 
  •	Written Phonogram Review –The student hears the phonogram sounds, followed by a pause; the student repeats the sound(s), listens for a cue, if needed, and then writes the phonogram on lined paper. The card is immediately shown so the student can check for accuracy.
  •	Differentiated Practice – Specific phonograms (from all 87) can be selected that need more practice. These phonograms can then be practiced in Phonogram Introduction, Oral Phonogram Review, or Written Phonogram Review.

comments: Very disappointed that this app stops doing the audio portion aloud after about 15 phonograms. There must be some kind of bug on the android version. I have to back all the way out and restart the app in order for it to play the sounds again. It has been the same problem ever since we started using it 3 weeks ago. Very frustrating. Please fix bug. When it does work, it is good and it is nice to be able to hear the sounds. I regret I paid for this.

Works great on my android phone, absolutely useless on my sons fire tablet. Gets stuck a few letters into practice and won't make any sounds. Restarting the app doesn't help either. Pretty annoyed I had to purchase it on 2 devices just to get one that works.

I was hoping to use this app for a class and as a practice tool. But after downloading it, it has not worked. There is no sound. The whole point of this app is to help with phonogram sounds. I would not recommend this app.
The sound keep stopping. Is this just me? I have to restart the app every few letters. Other than that it is great just wish it would continue with the sounds.
This app freezes or gets six to eight letters in then the sound stops working. Waste of money.

title: Toca Hair Salon Me
description:
Give your friends and family a totally new look! Simply snap a picture and you’re transported to a world of hair-raising fun! 

In this new version of the wildly popular Toca Hair Salon series we want you to create the characters! 

Toca Hair Salon Me lets you be the customer and the stylist! Curly, straight or purple? Create a funky hairdo any way you like. Grow it long or cut it short, shave one side or spray paint it every color of the rainbow. The possibilities are endless! 

Add accessories such as hats, sunglasses and hair clips to top it off. Don’t forget to take a photo and share with friends. Now you can use your own photos as backdrops to complete your style transformation. 

Check out what’s new in Toca Hair Salon Me! 
- Snap a picture of your friends to create their new hairstyle 
- Or use a photo from your camera roll 
- Tons of fun new accessories from mustaches to hats 
- Even more hair colors to choose from 
- Create photo backgrounds from your own pictures 

And all the features you already love: 
- Use G.R.O. to make short hair long again 
- Lather, rinse & blow-dry 
- Use tools to curl, straighten, crimp, shave & trim 
- Characters make fun faces and sounds while you style them 
- No rules or stress – play any way you want to! 
- Kid-friendly interface 
- No third-party advertising 
- No in-app purchases  

Endless hours of hairstyling fun awaits with hair cutting tools and accessories at ready to play with! Be a hairstylist and give your friends and family a crazy, fun or cool haircut that they’ll love.

With no rules or time limit, kids of all ages will love this hair salon app. Any hair cut or hair style is possible, so tap into your creativity and let your imagination run wild! 

***

ABOUT TOCA BOCA
At Toca Boca, we believe in the power of play to spark kids’ imaginations and help them learn about the world. We design our products from the kids' perspective to empower kids to be playful, to be creative and to be who they want to be. Our products include award-winning apps that have been downloaded more than 130 million times in 215 countries and offer fun, safe, open-ended play experiences. Learn more about Toca Boca and our products at tocaboca.com.

PRIVACY POLICY
Privacy is an issue that we take very seriously. To learn more about how we work with these matters, please read our privacy policy: http://tocaboca.com/privacy

title: Periodic Table 2020 PRO - Chemistry
description:
The chemistry falls into to number of the most important sciences and is one of the main school objects.
Its studying begins with the Periodic Table. Interactive approach to a training material is more effective than classical. As in it technologies which became the family for the modern pupils are used.

Periodic Table - is a free application for Android which displays the entire periodic table at startup interface. The table has a long-form approved by the International Union of Pure and Applied Chemistry (IUPAC) as the core. Besides the periodic table of chemical elements, you can use the Table of solubility.

Differences PRO version of FREE:
- More interactive tables
- Continuous addition of new application information elements
- More information about the additional elements
- Conductivity
- Electric type
- Magnetic type
- Bulk magnetic susceptibility
- Specific magnetic susceptibility
- Temperature Superconductivity
- Color of the item
- Density
- Refractive Index
- Coefficient of thermal conductivity
- Electronegativity
- Valence
- Radioactivity
- Half life
- Molar volume
and much more

- When you click on any element provides information that is constantly updated.
- For most of the items have an image.
- For more information, there are direct links to Wikipedia for each item.
- Table solubility
- To find any element you can use the search. The search engine is not choosy to the registry or writing style search.
- You can sort the items in 10 categories:
• Alkaline earth metals
• Other nonmetals
• Alkali metals
• Halogens
• Transition metals
• Noble gases
• Semiconductor
• Lanthanides
• Metalloids
• Actinides
Elements of the selected category will be listed in the search results and are highlighted in the table on the main application screen.

◈◈◈Copying, distribution and modification of the application - Periodic Table PRO, is prohibited without the permission of the developer. Actions without the consent of the developer are illegal and bear criminal, administrative and civil liability.◈◈◈

iOS version in App Store: http://itunes.apple.com/app/id1451726577
Frequently asked questions: http://chernykh.tech/pt/faq.html

comments: Everything is pretty well done. The only problem(that is pretty major in my opinion) is the reactions tab. When you enter a chemical it tells you in Russian how many hits it got. The app crashes when you put parenthesis( which is not expected because many many many formulas use regular parenthesis : Al(OH)3 for instance) and really just the fact that yes, there are a ton of reactions, but there's also some that shouldn't get missed like Schweitzer's reagent or Caro's acid or Na[Al(OH)4] complex
Great app. One suggestion would be to make the "electrons protons neutrons" section tappable which opens the isotope list. It would be good if the isotope list showed percentages as well.

Hi. I am rating this low because I purchased it but it still keeps crashing for listing all the elementes for some characteristics like Electronegativite and density. Please fix it and i will rate again. Thanks!

Pretty comprehensive app. Handy to have when you've got chemistry homework. Would be nice to see more tables added such as acid/base equilibrium constants Ka and Kb values, and maybe shapes of the orbitals and types of bonding (pi vs sigma bonds).
Good, but... It would be nice if you could add wave length in the emmision spectrums, and also a Electro configuration table for komplex structures would be nice (like hexacyanoferrat(III))

title: ISS Detector Pro
description:
Have you seen the International Space Station? You can actually see it in the night sky.
See the Starlink satellite train with the Famous Objects (included in the Filter menu).

If you like space or astronomy, you will like this ISS tracker app.

ISS Detector Pro includes the functionality of ISS Detector (free) with all the Extensions and no ads.

You can see more in the night sky:
Radio Amateur Satellites
Track dozens of ham and weather satellites. Includes transmitter frequencies and Doppler shift calculations.

Famous Objects
Track Hubble, X-37B, Fitsat, Tiangong, Rocket bodies and more. Most are visible.

Comets and Planets
Track comets as they come closer to earth and become bright enough to see.

ISS Detector Pro will tell you when and where to look for the International Space Station or Iridium flares. You get an alarm a few minutes before a pass. You will never miss a pass of the International Space Station and you will never miss the bright flashes of the iridium communication satellites. ISS Detector will also check if the weather conditions are right. A clear sky is perfect for spotting.

• Overview of the coming passes
• Weather conditions for perfect sightings
• Notifications and Alarms
• Share sightings on social media.


ISS Detector combines data from Nasa, Heavens-above.com, minorplanetcenter.net and weather from yr.no.

title: Ranger School Professional
description:
Are preparing for Ranger School or looking for the perfect hip pocket training aid on Infantry tactics?

Ranger School Professional helps you fully prepare for the tactical and technical portion of Ranger School, deployment, CTC rotation or hip pocket training by giving you instant access to Infantry tactics classes given by actual Ranger experts, high-definition video instruction, FAQ, Ranger School Tips provided by instructors and former Ranger students, quick access to the information on ARTB website, and much more.

If you’re interested in attending Ranger School or to sharpen your tactical and technical knowledge, then this app will help you achieve your goals. With over 39+ instructional videos for all three phases of Ranger School, quizzes specifically designed to test your knowledge, quick access to the Ranger School handbook and other manuals, and tons more, you’ll be set for success. 

Already graduated Ranger School? Ranger graduates often forget in detail the classes they were taught because of exhaustion and sleep deprivation, but now you can reference this app when you want to brush up on your knowledge or before you give a class to your Soldiers. 

Ranger School Professional is constantly getting updated and gets the information from the source. This app is the ultimate resource if you are trying to significantly increase your chances of graduating or being a more proficient Infantryman. If you have a question or concern, you can message us from the app and get a quick response. 

Ranger School Professional includes all of the following:

*Squad Classes:
FOOM, React to Contact, Squad Attack, Break Contact, React to Ambush, React to Indirect Fire, Cross Small Open Danger Area, Cross Large Open Danger Area, Cross Linear Danger Area, and Link up, Area Reconnaissance, Ambush, and Patrol Base

*Platoon Classes:
Operations Order, Fragmentary Order, Platoon Ambush, Patrol Base, and Raid

* Ranger Tactical Tasks:
Maintain M249 MG, Fire M249 MG, Maintain M240B MG, Fire M240B MG, Employ M18A1 Claymore Mine, Operate SINCGARS, Operate MBITR, and Acquire Position with DAGR

* Ranger Knots:
Bowline, Clove Hitch, Double Figure 8, Rerouted Figure 8, Figure 8 slip, Munter Hitch, Prusik, and Rappel Seat

*Ranger School:
Prerequisites, General Information, Environmental Considerations, Graduation Photos, and Rangers In Action Demonstration

*Extra:
Land Navigation Test, CWST, SKEDCO, Malvesti, Darby Queen, Rope Bridge, Lessons / Tips

* FAQ:
Ask a question you have about Ranger School; also look up past questions that were asked

*Quizzes

* Access to all publications that Ranger School Professional referenced

If you're serious about being an expert in your field or preparing for Ranger School and want to increase your chances of graduating, then this is the app for you. Don't take the chance when it comes to earning the Ranger tab!

*** Ranger School Professional requires a high-speed data connection to stream videos. we recommend at least 15 Mbps or faster. 

*** If you encounter any problems with the app or not satisfied please contact us at customerservice@uppertierdevelopment.com we care about your concerns and will do our best to make it right.

**ACTORS AND ANIMATIONS USED FOR REPRESENTATION PURPOSES ONLY AND NOT MEANT TO IMPLY MILITARY OR DOD ENDORSEMENT. RANGER SCHOOL PROFESSIONAL IS NOT AFFILIATED, SPONSORED, OR ENDORSED BY THE AIRBORNE AND RANGER TRAINING BRIGADE, UNITED STATES ARMY, DEPARTMENT OF DEFENSE, OR UNITED STATES GOVERNMENT.

Already graduated Ranger School? Ranger graduates often forget in detail the classes they were taught because of exhaustion and sleep deprivation, but now you can reference this app when you want to brush up on your knowledge or before you give a class to your Soldiers.

Ranger School Professional is constantly getting updated and gets the information from the source. This app is the ultimate resource if you are trying to significantly increase your chances of graduating or being a more proficient Infantryman. If you have a question or concern, you can message us from the app and get a quick response.

Ranger School Professional includes all of the following:

*Squad Classes:
FOOM, React to Contact, Squad Attack, Break Contact, React to Ambush, React to Indirect Fire, Cross Small Open Danger Area, Cross Large Open Danger Area, Cross Linear Danger Area, and Link up, Area Reconnaissance, Ambush, and Patrol Base

*Platoon Classes:
Operations Order, Fragmentary Order, Platoon Ambush, Patrol Base, and Raid

* Ranger Tactical Tasks:
Maintain M249 MG, Fire M249 MG, Maintain M240B MG, Fire M240B MG, Employ M18A1 Claymore Mine, Operate SINCGARS, Operate MBITR, and Acquire Position with DAGR

* Ranger Knots:
Bowline, Clove Hitch, Double Figure 8, Rerouted Figure 8, Figure 8 slip, Munter Hitch, Prusik, and Rappel Seat

*Ranger School:
Prerequisites, General Information, Environmental Considerations, Graduation Photos, and Rangers In Action Demonstration

*Extra:
Land Navigation Test, CWST, SKEDCO, Malvesti, Darby Queen, Rope Bridge, Lessons / Tips

* FAQ:
Ask a question you have about Ranger School; also look up past questions that were asked

*Quizzes

* Access to all publications that Ranger School Professional referenced

If you're serious about being an expert in your field or preparing for Ranger School and want to increase your chances of graduating, then this is the app for you. Don't take the chance when it comes to earning the Ranger tab!

*** Ranger School Professional requires a high-speed data connection to stream videos. we recommend at least 15 Mbps or faster.

*** If you encounter any problems with the app or not satisfied please contact us at customerservice@uppertierdevelopment.com we care about your concerns and will do our best to make it right.

**ACTORS AND ANIMATIONS USED FOR REPRESENTATION PURPOSES ONLY AND NOT MEANT TO IMPLY MILITARY OR DOD ENDORSEMENT. RANGER SCHOOL PROFESSIONAL IS NOT AFFILIATED, SPONSORED, OR ENDORSED BY THE AIRBORNE AND RANGER TRAINING BRIGADE, UNITED STATES ARMY, DEPARTMENT OF DEFENSE, OR UNITED STATES GOVERNMENT.
summary: Prepare for Ranger School, Deployment, CTC Rotation or Hip Pocket Training!

comments: Good app however the following are potential problems I found.. Following need be possibly updated Packing list from 2018. Class dates are 2019. The following PDFs are not opening. Boot policy, ARTB comanders letter, artb cms letter, building mental toughness for ranger school, ranger school preparation, sample ranger school training... I look forward to veiwing the rest of the app and leaving my input. Everything ranger school all in one place and wall organized.

Great app. Use it during some down time, while deployed. Gives any individual a little head start before hitting the school. I would give this app 5 stars however, I've been waiting for the app to be complete. STILL MISSING FLORIDA PLEASE UPDATE!!!! other then that little bit, please keep up the great work. Some of use need any advantage we can get.

This is one of the best school/training apps that I have used. Not only will the information on this app set you up for success when you go to Ranger School but it will also help you train your Soldiers. The fact that it is straight forward and easy to use makes it that much better. I recommend this app to all my Junior Leaders and Soldiers.

Excellent app that has all of the tactical information an Infantryman could want for small unit tactics. A one stop source for any aspiring Infantryman who wants to be prepared for the U.S. Army Ranger School. Easy to use and to navigate, with doctrinal knowledge at your fingertip!
Very easy to use. Has a lot of detailed videos.

Duke Street
Norwich
NR3 1PD
recentChanges: Minor improvements.
comments: This app really helped me understand the questions better by the mistakes I was making as it explains why it's wrong or right. That be being said - none of the question were phrased exactly the same within the mock exam to the real test, in most cases it was completely different. However, understanding my mistakes alongside what I already knew it made my exam a lot smoother and stopped any panic. Which resulted in a pass.

This app is 100% legitimate! It helps you to understand and reinforce the concepts. I highly recommend. It assisted me in passing (as well as taking a class). Do not rely soley on the app, it is meant to help you reinforce what you learn. My ONLY complaint is the progress button. When taking mock exams, if you accidentally press the button, you cannot go back to your place in the exam. Please put in a pop up that asks if you really want to exit the exam, or allow re-entry (a back button option).

Been using for a couple of days now and whilst it is ok, I have run into problems when reviewing tests I've taken. If I've answered incorrectly I will be told so, but then the right answer will not be given to me, meaning I'm not learning from any mistakes I make. Also, even though sometimes I have answered a question correctly, and it shows as correct, when I go to review it and click 'explain' it shows information for a different answer than the one I gave. Overall, an OK app.

Overall the app is ok. However, I have found that what I select on the mock exams is changed when I finish it. For example I select answer A, however when reviewing my answers it is listed as incorrect and that I chose answer B, which I didn't.
Hate the update. After you take practice exam it will not tell you right answers anymore, only explain why yours are wrong. Not as helpful as before the update.

title: PhET Simulations
description:
Engage in learning science and math with the award-winning PhET simulations! Whether understanding atoms, exploring energy, or mastering multiplication, there is a sim for every learner. Perfect for at home, in class, or on the road, this app delivers all PhET HTML5 sims (over 45 sims) in one easy-to-use package.

Developed by experts at the University of Colorado Boulder, PhET sims are used by millions of students every year. The PhET Android app delivers these exclusive features:
• Offline play: learn on the bus or at the park without a WiFi connection.
• Favorites: pick your favorite sims and create your own custom collection.
• Easy sorting: find the right sims for you.
• Fullscreen: maximize your screen real estate for optimal sim exploration.
• Automatic updates: get the latest HTML5 sims as soon as they are released.

PARENTS: Find out how much your child loves the learning experience through the lens of discovery.
TEACHERS: Have your favorite HTML5 sims at your fingertips, even without internet access. 
ADMINISTRATORS: The PhET app is optimized for school use, so your teachers will be seamlessly up to date. 
STUDENTS: Tell your parents and teachers there’s an app that makes learning about science and math more exciting - and it’s only 99 cents!

Note: The app does not include PhET’s Java or Flash sims. In addition, although we are currently working on improving the accessibility of our sims, most of the sims included in this app do not include keyboard navigation or screen reader access. As accessible sims become available, they will be updated within the app.

Proceeds from the app support the development of more HTML5 sims. On behalf of the PhET team and the students whose lives you have helped improve — Thank you!

comments: Simulations they have are good, but no where near as complete as the website
This is a cool project. Please release Fluid Pressure and Flow in HTML5, I built and ran the project in local and that seems to be working fine.

Downloaded this app for one reason, Plate Tectonic and for some reason its the only program not on the app. I downloaded the app from the website page with the plate tectonic because the webpage wouldn't work. please update the app with the plate tectonic that your website says it should be on and I'll update the review.
Waste of money. Not even 1% of the simulatuons available online using a plain HTML browser over a PC/ Mac for free are available through a paid app.

these simulations are more helpful in india as here many schools does not have good labs .It help students to understand concept of physics easly . thanks very much for providing us such type of interactive simulations in less price . more simulations must be added also.

comments: This app is one of the only apps that actually works and its pretty cool, theres only 3 things i have against it: the zoom feature is really inconvenient and werid, the fill tool just straight up dosnt work, and the ui looks really bad, maybe if this got a big update i would give 5 stars

Overall i think this app is great and is very well optimized, but i would really like if you could add a feature that would let us import textures from other texturpacks that we have in our internal storage. It would really help us make a texture pack that us people really enjoy. I know there is a way to import textures but what i am saying is i want to import large amounts of textures to the texture pack i am making at once like for example i want to have the dark mode gui in my texture pack

It does what it says, it just looks horrible while doing it. The ui looks like it came straight from the early 2000s. The ui is so bad that you cant zoom in far enough to edit the fire, and the eraser tool doesnt go big enough to erase anything like the lumpkin blur. This app needs a overhaul, please.

It's good, I just have problems with making new texture packs. When I open my new pack, I'm unable to click on a section, when I try to search, nothing shows up. I'll give a 5 star rating if you fix this bug.

This is a great texture pack maker for minecraft and its not a rip off like the other texture apps put there but theres a problem i can't use the skins i made with skinseed for zombie mobs and theres no shading option but other than that its worth the buck. Can you also make the mob making easier i get confused where the nose legs and other stuff is

title: Avokiddo ABC Ride
description:
Have you ever seen the letter E hatched from an egg? How about a K popping out of a kangaroo’s pouch? Ride your bike and enjoy an exciting hide and seek, letter adventure with Beck and Bo! Solve fun puzzles, find the hidden letters, learn the alphabet and practice spelling in this educational word puzzle game!

• "Avokiddo ABC Ride turns learning the alphabet into an adventure" - USA TODAY
• "A really high quality alphabet app...beautifully designed." - Cool Mom Tech
• “A standout in the saturated app marketplace...a classic among ABC apps.” - Teachers With Apps
• Editor's Choice by Best Apps For Kids, Fun Educational Apps, AppySmarts & Top Best Apps For Kids

FUN, HIDE AND SEEK ACTIVITIES

Start your journey by putting Beck or Bo on the bike. Drag the bike to move seamlessly across 26 interactive scenes loaded with fun preschool activities and puzzles. Each scene offers a unique, hide and seek game associated with a letter and a word. The G is wrapped in a Gift, the H is hidden under a Hat, the S swims with the Seal, the J is jammed up in the Jelly, the W is pulled out of a Well. 

Kids will use their logic, observation and problem solving skills to find the hidden letters in a whole host of scenarios and unexpected animal encounters! Bathe the cute pig, feed the hungry hippo, take care of the crying baby monkey, match vegetables, build a robot and so much more! Learning the alphabet has never been so fun!

SPELLING PUZZLES

Practice spelling, phonics and word recognition! Drag the letters in place to spell the words while listening to the letter names or phonetic sounds. Choose between lowercase or uppercase letters. Adjust the difficulty by having letters shuffled or in order.

MEMORABLE ALLITERATIONS

Each scene is accompanied by a short speech narration that provides clever hints through inventive and memorable alliterations. "Jump and jiggle on the jelly to find the J", "Make the magnet meet the M", "Fill the four flowerpots with flowing water to find the F". The sweet narration adds a storytelling aspect to the activities, helps build vocabulary and enhances kids' listening comprehension.

MAIN FEATURES

• 26 interactive scenes each associated with a word and a letter
• 26 unique, hide and seek games for hours of repeat play
• Play and problem solve to reveal the hidden letters
• Drag the letters to spell the words while listening to their names or phonetic sounds 
• Lowercase & uppercase letters
• Original narration with inventive alliteration 
• Bike through the alphabet seamlessly from letter to letter, or opt out and choose your own path
• Have fun with the quirky animals and hilarious encounters
• Collect stars while riding from one scene to the next
• Beautiful graphics inviting kids to explore and discover
• Ideal for toddlers, preschool & kindergarten children
• No in-app purchases, no third-party ads

EDUCATIONAL VALUE

• Teaches letter recognition, name and basic phonics
• Learn new words through playful exploration 
• Practice forming words and reinforce spelling
• Associate letters with objects and animals through memorable alliterated concepts
• Enhance creative thinking and problem solving skills
• Inspire curiosity as youngsters explore cause and effect
• Exercise memory and spatial relations
• Build vocabulary 

PRIVACY POLICY
We respect your privacy and the on-line safety of your children! We do not collect or share any personal information. The app has no third-party ads or in-app purchases. As a MOMs with Apps member, we follow the "Know what's inside" best practices for kids’ apps. View our privacy policy: http://avokiddo.com/privacy-policy/

recentChanges: Minor improvements
comments: Great app! You pay one time and you get the complete game(entire alphabet), no in-app purchases, no ads. Fun and educational. NOTE TO AVOKIDDO If you made one for numbers and math I would buy it! Please consider ;)

Good game. Would be nice to have a choice of narrator to go with us/uk spellings (I've never heard and way "apricot" like that before!) but understand that is much more costly to develop. The biggest issue is that kids can drag the letters in any order when spelling, I would prefer an option to force writing the word left-to-right (you know like we do everywhere else).

I have a hard time finding good games for my 3 year old. This one was totally worth the money. Its enertaining and he learns letters and other skills by playing it. Its even fun to watch him play. Really digging avakiddo games
My 4 year old loves it! Lots of learning in a fun way!

This is by far the best game I have found for my 3-1/2 year old son. He really likes to play it and it is helping him learn his letters.  I realize you can jump to any letter manually, but I think it would be good to have an option to either start the game on a random letter instead of "A" every time and/or move through the letters in random order.  Overall, excellent, high quality game and well worth the price.

title: BirdGenie: ID Birds by Song
description:
BirdGenie™ is a breakthrough app that helps anyone with a smartphone or tablet accurately identify birds in the backyard, local park, or on the nature trail—all with the tap of a button! Just hold up your phone, record the bird singing, and BirdGenie™ helps you identify the species. The app’s highly developed sound identification ability and expert matching system enable bird enthusiasts to achieve an accuracy unheard of in the birding field. It’s perfect for anyone who wants to learn more about the birds around them.


BirdGenie™ includes up to two hundred vocalization types for one hundred species: literally all of the birds likely to be encountered in a backyard or local park, or on a hike, in North America at any time of the year. And the app is easy to use. Just point your smartphone or tablet at a bird, and tap the screen when the bird starts singing. The app’s automatic pre-record feature ensures that you won’t miss the beginning of the song and BirdGenie’s™ patented, highly accurate expert system matches the recording to the closest species. The app’s sophisticated noise-reduction feature means that even in noisy environments, where there is conversation or traffic, you can discover what bird you’re listening to.


Beyond specifying a bird species, BirdGenie™ provides sample songs and spectrograms to compare with your own recording and to guarantee a confident match. The app also includes pictures of all plumages, information about habitat and behavior, and links to further reading. It even has 3-D models for some of the species so you can match different views of a bird. You can share your recordings, photos, and matches with friends and other users, and if you’re so inclined, you can anonymously share recordings to a scientific database to help researchers learn about birdsong variations. No internet connection is required for anything but sharing, making the program accessible everywhere.


Perfect for anyone who wants to know what birds are singing around them, BirdGenie™ takes bird identification to a whole new awesome level.


With BirdGenie™ you can:


Quickly identify most birds just by recording their songs

Look at vivid images of the bird—some in 3-D!

Listen to samples of the bird’s various songs and compare them with your recording

Keep a log of all your recordings

Share your recordings, matches, and photos with friends and family

Browse the built-in catalog to learn about local species, their other songs, their habits and diet, and much more

Use the app anywhere, as no internet connection is required!

Important features of BirdGenie™:


The matching expert system beats anything in the market today

Easy-to-use guided user interface

Effective noise-reduction system helps users make identifications in less-than-ideal environments

Complete species accounts with multiple photos for all plumage types (some with 3-D models)

Comprehensive spectrograms (voiceprints of songs)

Tom Stephenson’s articles and photos have appeared in Birding and Bird Watcher’s Digest, at Surfbirds.com, and in the Handbook of the Birds of the World. He has guided groups across the United States and Asia. Stephen Travis Pope is an award-winning composer, performer, and software engineer who develops new digital-audio processing applications. He has worked on audio analysis programs and music search engines for over a decade. Scott Whittle lives in Cape May, New Jersey, and has 20 years of experience as a professional photographer and educator. His images have been published in a wide range of magazines, newspapers, and books. He and Tom Stephenson are members of the team that holds the U.S. Big Photo Day record. He is also the coauthor, with Tom Stephenson, of The Warbler Guide (Princeton University Press).

Requires Android 5.0 and above. Compatible with most common Android phones and tablets.




BirdGenie™ is a trademark of Princeton University Press.

Quickly identify most birds just by recording their songs

Look at vivid images of the bird—some in 3-D!

Listen to samples of the bird’s various songs and compare them with your recording

Keep a log of all your recordings

Share your recordings, matches, and photos with friends and family

Browse the built-in catalog to learn about local species, their other songs, their habits and diet, and much more

Use the app anywhere, as no internet connection is required!

Important features of BirdGenie™:


The matching expert system beats anything in the market today

Easy-to-use guided user interface

Effective noise-reduction system helps users make identifications in less-than-ideal environments

Complete species accounts with multiple photos for all plumage types (some with 3-D models)

Comprehensive spectrograms (voiceprints of songs)

Tom Stephenson’s articles and photos have appeared in Birding and Bird Watcher’s Digest, at Surfbirds.com, and in the Handbook of the Birds of the World. He has guided groups across the United States and Asia. Stephen Travis Pope is an award-winning composer, performer, and software engineer who develops new digital-audio processing applications. He has worked on audio analysis programs and music search engines for over a decade. Scott Whittle lives in Cape May, New Jersey, and has 20 years of experience as a professional photographer and educator. His images have been published in a wide range of magazines, newspapers, and books. He and Tom Stephenson are members of the team that holds the U.S. Big Photo Day record. He is also the coauthor, with Tom Stephenson, of The Warbler Guide (Princeton University Press).

Requires Android 5.0 and above. Compatible with most common Android phones and tablets.




BirdGenie™ is a trademark of Princeton University Press.
summary: Quickly identify most birds by recording their songs with the tap of a button!
comments: Very cool idea, but no way to help the app learn if it asks the same questions over and over, and presents the same potential matches. I know for a fact I was listening to an Eastern Whipbird, but try telling the app it wasn't a dang Crackle. Come up with some new birds, Princeton!

Did an okay job - Developer bug clutters photo folder big time by not self containing all image files and sound files to a dedicated folder. Instead it created a hundred folders within my root image and sound folders... Incredibly annoying!

I am uninstalling this ap. No matter how close, crystal clear and beautiful a recording I obtained, I NEVER got a match. On top of that, the images from the app populated my gallery in an intrusive way that seemed impossible to remedy! Enough. Cumbersome and useless. So sad, I had dreamed of an app like this for years, just one that worked. and argh!! after removing the app, the distorted images are still there and I need to search them out and delete manually.

I didnt even have a chance to try it out. I had to uninstall because if the ridiculous way it overtook my phones photo gallery. I couldnt find anything in there anymore except what it dumped in there. It was absolutely ridiculous. Just what a person wants when they ooen their photo gallery is to habe to wade through a hundred photos of vouce recordings of birds. Terrible design flaw, i expected better with it coming out of a university.

I can't believe that I PAID for this app. Every time I tried to use it, the app shut down after recording the birds. Plus, my gallery filled up with sound recordings and bird pictures. Very upsetting.

title: Army Promotion ArmyADP.com Deluxe
description:
Contains over 43 MOI Subjects and over 3,800 Questions.  

Contains the  Exact questions the Board members will ask you when you go to the board.
 
Most up to date 2020 Army Study Guide containing subjects for most board MOI's.  

The App is Not a Multiple choice because 1SG's and CSM's will Not ask you a question and then give you 4 answers for you to choose from.  Army Leadership is for Soldiers, not High school seniors or someone that can choose A,B,C or D, but who actually knows the information so that they can teach and mentor Soldiers they will be leading.  
Also, the App does not give you a grading by subject option because that does not happen during an actual board.  As a board member, there is no grading behind the desk going on. We do not give you 70,80, or 90 Grade during the Board.  It is either a "Go" or "NO GO".  That decision is made based on how well "Prepared" for your board because we are looking for leaders that are will be prepared and not just studying at the last minute.  And yes we look at all the subjects on the MOI and can also tell if you are not prepared by the way a Soldier will stumble through an answer.  If a Soldier put the time in to Study, when a Question is asked, those that have put the time in already know what and how to answer because they recognize the Answer so they can easily give the answer to board members word for word.  
Not just the  ADP's and all MOI subjects like Drill and Ceremony and many more.  It also has PMCS for Mondays, Army Cadence's, Creeds and more.

comments: Outdated with many typos. Doesn't reflect new ADP and TC document information. The section about PMCS doesn't give true guidelines or checklist for vehicles. Might as well say kick tires and check lights. Would love a refund but I've had the app 3 days before actually getting into it to find all the information that was incorrect and potentially disastrous if repeated in a board.

Broke won't open. I would love a refund also the app opens open and stays on the open screen the background all back us army. It used to work now it doesn't at all and I don't know why. It gives out and error code saying connect to the wifi so I change to different wifi's and restarted my phone twice. And it still stay on the open screen or with the error message. I've tried many times but it just doesn't work for me.
Fantastic app to help you pass the board. I just wish it worked offline but other than that it's great, and the staff is super helpful if you email them.
I noticed once the picture on the the study guide is push a play button appears but doesn't work. Is this feature a working mode? Mine does not work when push.
Overall not a bad app but it really needs a search function. Just having a search function will result in a better review.

title: Mobile Observatory 3 Pro - Astronomy
description:
Mobile Observatory 3 Pro is the perfect tool for anybody interested in the sky's wonders, from the occasional sky gazer to the  passionate amateur astronomer. 

Do you want to know if the next lunar eclipse is visible from your location or when the next bright comet is visible? Would you like to be notified by your smart phone next time, Jupiter and the Moon meet in the sky? Do you want to know what the blazing bright object in the evening sky is? Do you want to be always up-to-date which celestial events that are visible from your location? Then this app is a must-have for you!

Mobile Observatory Pro is the successor to one of the most successful paid astronomy apps for Android (100 000+ downloads and a rating of 4.7). It has the following improvements compared to the previous version:

  -  Completely new user interface
  -  45000 stars plus optionally 2.5 mio stars for download
  -  Photorealistic display of the night and day sky with correctly illuminated landscape. Its the only app on Android which renders the sky physically correct, taking into account atmospheric scattering. Only the real sky is more beautiful...
  -  Augumented sky view using your device's camera
  -  3D-view of the Solar System
  -  Cardboard viewing of the night sky or the Solar System in 3D
  -  Map of the Earth showing day and night
  - Lots of great widgets for your home screen
   - Daily notifications of current celestial events
   - More than 60000 Minor Planets with daily updates of orbital parameters
   - More than 1000 Comets with daily updates
   - Artificial Satellites including the International Space Station (ISS)
  -  ... and much much more...

Mobile Observatory does not only include a live, zoomable sky map which tells you what sky object you are looking at but provides you with loads of detailed extra information on stars, planets, deep sky objects, meteor showers, comets, asteroids, lunar and solar eclipses as well as detailed ephemeris of all included sky objects and an interactive top-down view of the Solar System. All that in just one app!

More Features:
- Live mode (point device on sky and get information on what you see)
- Calendar showing detailed descriptions of celestial events
- Push celestial events to your phone's calendar and set a reminder alarm
- Rise, set, and transit times for any object
- Position of any object in the sky (altitude and direction)
- Twilight times, length of day
- 2500 selected NGC objects (galaxies, clusters, ...)
- Messier Catalog (110 objects) complete with images
- Caldwell Catalog (110 objects) complete with images
- Hidden Treasures Catalog (109 objects) complete with images
- Meteor streams (begin, maximum, hourly rate, ...)
- Lunar and solar eclipses information
- Lunar librations, ascending node, maximum declination
- Moon phases, the apparent view of the sun and planets
- Current image of the Sun and sunspot number
- Automatically generated visibility report for any object
- Simulation of light pollution
- Intuitive User Interface: quickly find what you are looking for
- Widget with rise & set times of the Sun and Moon
- Detailed ephemeris, visibility information of all objects
- Dates of conjunctions between any object with planets or the Moon
- Accurate calculations for dates between 1900 and 2100

comments: I used to love this app. Since late upgrade it's unstable, and much more difficult to get to what I want. I used to be able to select the object I wish to view and easily know where and when I could see it. Now I can't seem to figure out what I used to be able to do so easily. Maybe I'm just getting dumber. Time to uninstall and look for something else.

Not sure what else is out there, been a fan of SkEye for some time but after trying MO free I've moved to the paid version It has added more enjoyment to a passing interest in astronomy with greater access to a variety of information and features. eg Downloadable catalogues. Unfortunately no way to turn off the live motion during Skyview (not Live view). Very annoying to keep chasing an object as it moves off the screen!!

This app is amazing! So many helpful features. I've used it for a few years now over 3 different phones and never once encountered a bug. I work in Outdoor Education and it is SO useful for campouts and stargazing programs. Worth the money for sure!

I've been a huge fan of this app since its first version The new one is just as informative and easy to use, with a great update to the interface and features. The developer has always been responsive as well. By far the best value of any paid astronomy app. Edit: U/I updates done right. Just keeps getting better. 3.3.0 is beautiful and includes great new functionality. Keep it up!

Tons of features that I have the confidence are always up to date with the most accurate view for my location. Graphics and performance are outstanding. A must have app for anyone that can see the night sky at their house!

title: Bugs and Buttons
description:
The bugs are back in town! As the original developers of the bug apps, we’re proud to have them back.

Find out why the award winning Bugs and Buttons is loved by kids and adored by parents and professionals alike. This app is a carefully crafted collection of 18 whimsical games and activities designed to reenforce countless educational skills while providing an entertaining and healthy experience for kids. 

* 18 games and activities (it’s a lot) 
* Incredibly detailed graphics and animations to intrigue
 * Beautifully composed music to delight
 * Lots of interactions from tap, drag, pinch, to tilt
 * Fun and adorable animated bugs: ladybugs, bees, butterflies, and more

* Over 40 achievements to collect; a fun book of bug stamps 
* Find hidden achievements behind objects. 

Many games use an advanced leveling that will adjust to the child’s performance. For a minimum amount of game play, the leveled games will become harder or easier based on how many mistakes the child makes. After the minimum amount of play, the game will enter into a bonus mode that will only increase difficulty until a final mistake is made. We find this provides an entertaining, yet challenging, experience without overwhelming. 

CHILD PRIVACY POLICY
	•	Kids Lock gated area to protect settings - just for parents
	•	No third party advertising
	•	No in-app purchases
	•	We do not collect or share information of any kind


If you have any questions, comments, or feedback — email us at support@snaptwostudio.com or visit us as snaptwostudio.com

comments: This is a fantastic app! It has many different learning games that will educate and entertain for hours.
The app keeps freezing up on my phone. It's frustrating.
Glad its back. This is one of our favorites!
so good for young children

Looking for an app for a toddler with developmental delays to help work on fine motor skills and problem solving and focus and I finally found this. I love it. Can't speak highly enough of it. Have tried every game and they are all beautiful and fun and easy to learn to do. Nothing here is obnoxious or annoying like so many other apps. This one will be useful for a few years I believe. Some really easy parts and some a little more complex. Thanks so much!

title: Dumb Ways JR Boffo's Breakfast
description:
Before the Dumb Ways characters grew up, they were already making mischief in all sorts of places – planes, trains, and here in the kitchen!

Boffo’s hungry, and you’re his chef! Make him an awesome cooked breakfast. Chop and grate ingredients, add sloppy items such as eggs and milk, stir the mix, cook it, add seasonings, and serve your meal to Boffo. Be ready for his reaction! Keep experimenting – how many different creations can you make for Boffo?

This app engages young children in fun, imaginative play. Your child is sure to return time after time to create endless food mash-ups for their hungry new friend. 

Features: 
• A fun, quirky character to cook for and interact with
• Choose from more than 20 different food items 
• Experiment with a range of kitchen tools 
• Explore stages of food preparation in a free-play approach
• Enjoy surprise reactions, including humorous animations and sound effects
• Use a variety of touch actions, such as tap, swipe, mix, and up-and-down strokes
• No rules or time limits – create your own fun meals
• Unlimited food combinations to support hours of repeat play
• Ideal for 3-7 year olds 
• No ads or in-app purchases 
• Play without a wifi or internet connection

Could never get it to open after installing and uninstalling numerous times. No response from developer after requesting refund.
I love this app it's so fun you can feed him...And it's fun to me it's a great game to play!
I paid three times and not download!
Dissatisfied with this game. Want a refund

title: Sky Guide
description:
Sky Guide is an astronomy app for sophisticated star enthusiasts and hobby astronomers who value well-founded and precise astronomical illustrations and data.

The basic app function displays a detailed, scalable and fully user-configurable celestial map with constellations and celestial objects (limit magnitude up to 6.3) that are visible with the naked eye or smaller telescopes. The place and time of observation as well as the direction of view can be manually configured by the user or automatically with the so-called “Live mode” (i.e. GPS, real-time and compass-guided).

Detailed additional information is available for every celestial object (fixed star, deep sky object, planet, moon, sun, meteorite shower). The information of the Bright Star Catalog and the Washington Double Star Catalog is made available for fixed stars. Additionally, users can add notes and links for every object.

The powerful search function makes it possible to align the map to a specific celestial object or guide the observer – in „live mode“ – to an object in the starry sky with specific notices. Searches can be performed according to the traditional name of an object, the catalog designation or the constellation. Moreover, the app makes it easy to identify celestial objects by aligning the device to the object in “Live mode”.

The functionality of the app is complemented by a number of astronomical tools and data, e.g. an astronomical event calculator, an orbit diagram (orrery), a moon viewer (a scalable, orthogonal, geocentric or topocentric moon projection while properly taking the libration, moon phase, position angle and parallactic angle into account) and an ephemerides generator.
